GK16simhrsku:1: The Rasārṇava-sudhākara of Siṃhabhūpāla. Critically edited with
GK16simhrsku:2: introduction and notes by T. Venkatacharya. Madras: Adyar Library and
GK16simhrsku:22: tasya bhāryā mahābhāgyā viṣṇoḥ śrīr iva viśrutā |
GK16simhrsku:26: siṃha-prabhur vennamanāyakaś ca vīrāgraṇī reca-mahī-patiś ca ||SRs_1.9||
GK16simhrsku:27: kalāv eka-pado dharmo yair ebhiś caraṇair iva |
GK16simhrsku:30: namatām unnatiś citraṃ rājñām anamatāṃ natiḥ ||SRs_1.11||
GK16simhrsku:33: ānṛṇya samapādi yena vibhunā tat-tad-guṇair ātmano
GK16simhrsku:35: kṛtānta-jihvākuṭilāṃ kṛpāṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā yadīyāṃ trasatām arīṇām |
GK16simhrsku:36: svedodayaś cetasi saṃcitānāṃ mānoṣmaṇām ātanute praśāntim ||SRs_1.13||
GK16simhrsku:39: labdhvā labdha-kaṭhāri-rāya-virudaṃ rāhuttarāyāṅkitaṃ putraṃ nāgayanāyakaṃ vasumatī-vīraika-cūḍāmaṇim
GK16simhrsku:40: so' yaṃ siṃha-mahīpālo vasudeva iti sphuṭam |
GK16simhrsku:49: sodaryo balabhadra-mūrtir aniśaṃ devī priyā rukmiṇī pradyumnas tanayo' p pautra-nivaho yasyāniruddhādayaḥ
GK16simhrsku:50: so' yaṃ śrīpatir annapota-nṛpatiḥ kiṃ cānanāmbhoruhe dhatte cāru-sudarśana-śriyam asau satvātma-hastāmbuje ||SRs_1.18||
GK16simhrsku:55: yatra ca jāgrati śāsati jagatāṃ jāgarti nitya-kalyāṇam ||SRs_1.20||
GK16simhrsku:64: khaḍge khaḍge phalita-vapuṣaṃ yaṃ purastād vilokya |
GK16simhrsku:65: pratyāvṛttā api tata ito vīkṣamāṇā yadīyaṃ saṃmanyante sphuṭam avitathaṃ khaḍga-nārāyaṇāṅkam
GK16simhrsku:70: tayor abhūtāṃ putrau dvāv ādyo veda-girīśvaraḥ |
GK16simhrsku:71: dvitīyas tv advitīyo' sau yaśasā siṃha-bhūpatiḥ ||SRs_1.26||
GK16simhrsku:75: bali-dhvaṃsī bāṇaḥ para-puram anekaṃ ca viṣayaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:77: maheśo' yaṃ siṃha-kṣitipa iti yaṃ jalpati janaḥ ||SRs_1.28||
GK16simhrsku:82: satāṃ prītiṃ kurvan kuvalaya-vikāsaṃ viracayan kalāḥ kāntāḥ puṣṇan dadhad api ca jaivātṛka-kathām
GK16simhrsku:83: nitāntaṃ yo rājā prakaṭayati mitrodayam aho tathā cakrānandān api ca kamalollāsa-suṣamām ||SRs_1.30||
GK16simhrsku:84: tal-labdhāni ghanāghanair atitarāṃ vārāṃ pṛṣanty ambudhau svātyām eva hi śuktikāsu dadhate muktāni muktātmatām |
GK16simhrsku:85: yad dānodaka-vipruṣas tu sudhiyāṃ haste patantyo' bhavan māṇikyāni mahāmbarāṇi bahuśo dhāmāni hemāni ca ||SRs_1.31||
GK16simhrsku:86: nayanam ayaṃ guṇam aguṇaṃ padam apadaṃ nijam avetya ripu-bhūpāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:89: prāṇānāṃ parirakṣaṇāya bahuśo vṛttiṃ madīyāṃ gatās
GK16simhrsku:92: manye yasya dṛg-antayoḥ parisaraṃ sā kāma-dhenuḥ śritā ||SRs_1.33||
GK16simhrsku:94: ity antaḥ-pura-pṛcchayā yad ariṣu prāpteṣu lajjā-vaśam |
GK16simhrsku:105: yasyāḍhyaḥ prathamaḥ kumāra-tilakaḥ śrī-annapoto guṇair ekasyāgrajam ātma-rūpa-vibhave cāpe dvayor agrajam |
GK16simhrsku:107: satyoktau caturagrajaṃ vitaraṇe kiṃ cāpi pañcāgrajam ||SRs_1.37||
GK16simhrsku:116: etair anyaiś ca tanayaiḥ so' yaṃ siṃha-mahīpatiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:120: satāṃ ca rakṣām asatāṃ ca śikṣāṃ nyāyānurodhād anusandadhānajñāḥ ||SRs_1.41||
GK16simhrsku:123: tasmin śāsati siṃha-bhūmi-ramaṇe kṣmām annapotātmaje kāṭhinyaṃ kuca-maṇḍale taralatā netrāñcale subhruvām |
GK16simhrsku:124: vaiṣamyaṃ trivalīṣu manda-padatā līlālasāyāṃ gatau kauṭilyaṃ cikureṣu kiṃ ca kṛśatā madhye paraṃ badhyate ||SRs_1.43||
GK16simhrsku:129: bhagavan śrotum icchāmaḥ śrāvyaṃ dṛśyaṃ manoharam |
GK16simhrsku:132: iti pṛṣṭaḥ sa tair brahmā sarva-vedān anusmaran ||SRs_1.47||
GK16simhrsku:133: tebhyaś ca sāram ādāya nāṭya-vedam athāsṛjat |
GK16simhrsku:135: saha putrair imaṃ vedaṃ prayogeṇa prakāśaya |
GK16simhrsku:136: iti tena niyuktas tu bharataḥ saha sūnubhiḥ ||SRs_1.49||
GK16simhrsku:139: tathā tad-anusāreṇa śāṇḍilyaḥ kohalo' pi ca |
GK16simhrsku:140: dattilaś ca mataṅgaś ca ye cānye tat-tanūdbhavāḥ ||SRs_1.51||
GK16simhrsku:141: granthān nānā-vidhāṃś cakruḥ prakhyātās te mahītale |
GK16simhrsku:147: nedānīntana-dīpikā kim u tamaḥ-saṅhātam unmūlayej jyotsnā kiṃ na cakora-pāraṇa-kṛte tat-kāla-saṃśobhinī
GK16simhrsku:148: bālaḥ kiṃ kamalākarān dina-maṇir nollāsayed añjasā tat sampraty api mādṛśām api vacaḥ syād eva samprītaye ||SRs_1.55||
GK16simhrsku:153: rasotkarṣo hi nāṭyasya prāṇās tat sa nirūpyate |
GK16simhrsku:155: ānīyamānaḥ svādutvaṃ sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:157: budhair jñeyo' yam ālamba uddīpana iti dvidhā |
GK16simhrsku:159: ālambanaṃ mataṃ tatra nāyako guṇavān pumān |
GK16simhrsku:161: aujjvalyaṃ dhārmikatvaṃ ca kulīnatvaṃ ca vāgmitā |
GK16simhrsku:164: ete sādhāraṇāḥ proktāḥ nāyakasya guṇā budhaiḥ ||SRs_1.63||
GK16simhrsku:180: uktair guṇaiś ca sakalair yuktaḥ syād uttamo netā ||SRs_1.71||
GK16simhrsku:182: netā caturvidho' sau dhīrodāttaś ca dhīra-lalitaś ca ||SRs_1.72||
GK16simhrsku:188: gāmbhīryam avikāraḥ syāt saty api kṣobha-kāraṇe ||SRs_1.75||
GK16simhrsku:197: patiś copapatiś caiva vaiśikaś ceti bhedataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:198: patis tu vidhinā pāṇigrāhakaḥ kathyate budhaiḥ ||SRs_1.80||
GK16simhrsku:199: caturdhā so' pi kathito vṛttyā kāvya-vicakṣaṇaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:200: anukūlaḥ śaṭho dhṛṣṭo dakṣiṇaś ceti bhedataḥ ||SRs_1.81||
GK16simhrsku:203: nāyikāsv apy anekāsu tulyo dakṣiṇa ucyate |
GK16simhrsku:204: laṅghitācārayā yas tu vināpi vidhinā striyā ||SRs_1.83||
GK16simhrsku:205: saṅketaṃ nīyate prokto budhair upapatis tu saḥ |
GK16simhrsku:213: veśyopabhoga-rasiko yo bhavet sa tu vaiśikaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:218: nāyakānucaro bhaktaḥ kiñcid ūnaś ca tad-guṇaiḥ ||SRs_1.90||
GK16simhrsku:227: svakīyā parakīyā ca sāmānyā ceti sā tridhā |
GK16simhrsku:228: sampat-kāle vipat-kāle yā na muñcati vallabham ||SRs_1.95||
GK16simhrsku:230: sā ca svīyā tridhā mugdhā madhyā prauḍheti kathyate ||SRs_1.96||
GK16simhrsku:231: mugdhā nava-vayaḥ-kāmā ratau vāmā mṛduḥ krudhi |
GK16simhrsku:234: apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi na kiñcid api bhāṣate ||SRs_1.98||
GK16simhrsku:238: dhīrā tu vakti vakroktyā sotprāsaṃ sāgasaṃ priyam ||SRs_1.100||
GK16simhrsku:239: adhīrā paruṣair vākyaiḥ khedayed vallabhaṃ ruṣā |
GK16simhrsku:240: dhīrādhīra tu vakroktyā sa-bāṣpaṃ vadati priyam ||SRs_1.101||
GK16simhrsku:245: udāste surate dhīrā sāvahitthā ca sādarā |
GK16simhrsku:246: santarjya niṣṭhuraṃ roṣād adhīrā tāḍayet priyam ||SRs_1.104||
GK16simhrsku:248: dvedhā jyeṣṭhā kaniṣṭheti madhyā prauḍhāpi tādṛśī ||SRs_1.105||
GK16simhrsku:251: mugdhā tv eka-vidhā caivaṃ sā trayodaśadhoditā |
GK16simhrsku:252: anyāpi dvividhā kanyā paroḍhā ceti bhedataḥ ||SRs_1.107||
GK16simhrsku:253: tatra kanyā tv anūḍhā syāt sa-lajjā pitṛ-pālitā |
GK16simhrsku:255: pradhānam apradhānaṃ vā nāṭakādāv iyaṃ bhavet |
GK16simhrsku:260: eṣā syād dvividhā raktā viraktā ceti bhedataḥ ||SRs_1.111||
GK16simhrsku:261: tatra raktā tu varṇyā syād aprādhānyena nāṭake |
GK16simhrsku:264: sā ced divyā nāṭake tu prādhānyenaiva varṇyate ||SRs_1.113||
GK16simhrsku:268: rakteva rañjayed ibhyān niḥsvān mātrā vivāsayet ||SRs_1.115||
GK16simhrsku:272: ataś ca nāṭakādau tu varṇyā sā na bhaved iti |
GK16simhrsku:274: sāmānyā vanitā veśyā sā dravyaṃ param icchatā |
GK16simhrsku:275: guṇa-hīne ca na dveṣo nānurāgo guṇiny api |
GK16simhrsku:286: tās tu prāyeṇa dṛśyante sarvatra vyavahārataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:287: prathamaṃ proṣita-patikā vāska-sajjā tataś ca virahotkā ||SRs_1.121||
GK16simhrsku:288: atha khaṇḍitā matā syāt kalahāntaritābhisārikā caiva |
GK16simhrsku:289: kathitā ca vipralabdhā svādhīna-patis tathā cānyā ||SRs_1.122||
GK16simhrsku:295: bharatādayair abhidadhe strīṇām vāras tu vāsakaḥ ||SRs_1.125||
GK16simhrsku:301: anāgasi priyatame cirayaty utsukā tu yā ||SRs_1.128||
GK16simhrsku:303: asyās tu ceṣṭā hṛt-tāpo vepathuś cāṅga-sādanam ||SRs_1.129||
GK16simhrsku:306: bhoga-lakṣmāñcitaḥ prātar āgacchet sā hi khaṇḍitā |
GK16simhrsku:307: asyās tu cintā niḥśvāsas tūṣṇīṃ-bhāvo' śru-mocanam ||SRs_1.131||
GK16simhrsku:309: yā sakhīnāṃ puraḥ pāda-patitaṃ vallabhaṃ ruṣā ||SRs_1.132||
GK16simhrsku:310: nirasya paścāt tapati kalahāntaritā hi sā |
GK16simhrsku:311: asyās tu bhrānti-saṃlāpau moho niḥśvasitaṃ jvaraḥ ||SRs_1.133||
GK16simhrsku:312: muhuḥ pralāpa ity ādyā iṣṭāś ceṣṭā manīṣibhiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:315: svayaṃ vābhisared yā tu sā bhaved abhisārikā ||SRs_1.135||
GK16simhrsku:322: mṛṣā priye tu nidrāṇe pārśve tiṣṭhati niścalā |
GK16simhrsku:341: kṛtvā saṅketam aprāpte daivād vyathitā tu yā ||SRs_1.148||
GK16simhrsku:342: vipralabdheti sā proktā budhair asyās tu vikriyā |
GK16simhrsku:347: uttamā madhyamā nīcety evaṃ sarvāḥ striyas tridhā ||SRs_1.151||
GK16simhrsku:348: abhijātair bhoga-tṛptair guṇibhir yā ca kāmyate |
GK16simhrsku:350: vidadhaty apriyaṃ patyau svayam ācarati priyam |
GK16simhrsku:351: vallabhe sāparādhe' pi tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhati sottamā ||SRs_1.153||
GK16simhrsku:352: puṃsaḥ svayaṃ kāmayate kāmyate yā ca tair vadhūḥ |
GK16simhrsku:354: sāpakāre' pakartrī syāt snigdhe snihyati vallabhe |
GK16simhrsku:356: akasmāt kupyati ruṣaṃ prārthitāpi na muñcati |
GK16simhrsku:357: surūpaṃ vā kurūpaṃ vā guṇavantam athāguṇam ||SRs_1.156||
GK16simhrsku:358: sthaviraṃ taruṇaṃ vāpi yā vā kāmayate muhuḥ |
GK16simhrsku:365: āsāṃ dūtyaḥ sakhī ceṭī liṅginī prativeśinī ||SRs_1.160||
GK16simhrsku:366: dhātreyī śilpakārī ca kumārī kathinī tathā |
GK16simhrsku:372: sarvāsām api nārīṇāṃ yauvanaṃ tu caturvidham |
GK16simhrsku:382: nātirajyati kāntasya saṅgame kiṃ tu lajjate |
GK16simhrsku:383: stanau pīnau tanur madhyaḥ pāṇipādasya raktimā ||SRs_1.169||
GK16simhrsku:385: nitambo vipulo nābhir gabhīrā jaghanaṃ ghanam ||SRs_1.170||
GK16simhrsku:393: vicchāyatā khara-sparśo' py aṅgānāṃ ślathatā manāk ||SRs_1.174||
GK16simhrsku:394: adhare masṛṇo rāgas tṛtīye yauvane bhavet |
GK16simhrsku:399: nirmāṃsatā ca bhavati caturthe yauvane striyāḥ ||SRs_1.177||
GK16simhrsku:405: yena bhūṣitavad bhāti tad rūpam iti kathyate ||SRs_1.180||
GK16simhrsku:407: pratibhāti yad aṅgeṣu lāvaṇyaṃ tad ihocyate ||SRs_1.181||
GK16simhrsku:411: sārūpyaṃ nayati prājñair ābhirūpyaṃ tad ucyate ||SRs_1.183||
GK16simhrsku:412: spṛṣṭaṃ yatrāṅgam aspṛṣṭam iva syān mārdavaṃ hi tat |
GK16simhrsku:416: na saheta kara-sparśaṃ yenāṅgaṃ madhyamaṃ hi tat |
GK16simhrsku:425: bhāvaṃ manogataṃ sākṣāt sva-hetuṃ vyañjayanti ye |
GK16simhrsku:428: tatra ca bhāvo hāvo helā śobhā kānti-dīptī ca ||SRs_1.191||
GK16simhrsku:429: prāgalbhyaṃ mādhuryaṃ dhairyaudāryaṃ ca cittajā bhāvāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:432: bhāva īṣat-prakāśo yaḥ sa hāva iti kathyate ||SRs_1.193||
GK16simhrsku:435: sā śobhā rūpa-bhogādyair yat syād aṅga-vibhūṣaṇam |
GK16simhrsku:441: sthirā cittonnatir yā tu tad dhairyam iti saṃjñitam |
GK16simhrsku:445: vihṛtaṃ ceti vijñeyā yoṣitāṃ daśa gātrajāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:447: ceṣṭitair gatibhir vā syāt sā līleti nigadyate |
GK16simhrsku:449: tātkāliko viśeṣo yaḥ sa vilāsa itīritaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:456: duḥkhiteva bahiḥ kupyed yatra kuṭṭamitaṃ hi tat ||SRs_1.205||
GK16simhrsku:457: iṣṭe' py anādaro garvān mānād bibboka īritaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:460: īrṣyayā māna-lajjābhyāṃ na dattaṃ yogyam uttaram ||SRs_1.207||
GK16simhrsku:461: kriyayā vyajyate yatra vihṛtaṃ tad udīritam |
GK16simhrsku:463: kathitāḥ sattvajāḥ strīṇām alaṅkārās tu viṃśatiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:464: sattvād daśaiva bhāvādyā jātā līlādayas tu na ||SRs_1.209||
GK16simhrsku:465: ato hi viṃśatir bhāvāḥ sāttvikā iti nocitam |
GK16simhrsku:468: bhojena krīḍitaṃ kelir ity anyau gātrajau smṛtau ||SRs_1.211||
GK16simhrsku:469: ato viṃśatir ity atra saṅkhyeyaṃ nopapadyate |
GK16simhrsku:471: ādyaḥ prāg eva bhāvādi-samutpatteś ca śaiśave |
GK16simhrsku:474: ato viṃśatir ity eṣā saṅkhyā saṅkhyāvatāṃ matā ||SRs_1.214||
GK16simhrsku:475: śobhā vilāso mādhuryaṃ dhairyaṃ gāmbhīryam eva ca |
GK16simhrsku:477: nīce dayādhike spardhā śauryotsāhau ca dakṣatā |
GK16simhrsku:478: yatra prakaṭatāṃ yānti sā śobheti prakīrtitā ||SRs_1.216||
GK16simhrsku:479: vṛṣabhasyeva gambhīrā gatir dhīraṃ ca darśanam |
GK16simhrsku:480: sasmitaṃ ca vaco yatra sa vilāsa itīritaḥ ||SRs_1.217||
GK16simhrsku:482: śṛṅgāra-pracurā ceṣṭā yatra tal lalitaṃ bhavet ||SRs_1.218||
GK16simhrsku:483: atra gāmbhīrya-dhairye dve cittaje gātrajāḥ pare |
GK16simhrsku:485: ālāpaś ca vilāpaś ca saṃlāpaś ca pralāpakaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:488: evaṃ dvādaśadhā proktā kīrtitā vāg-ārambhā vicakṣaṇaiḥ ||SRs_1.221||
GK16simhrsku:489: tatrālāpaḥ priyoktiḥ syād vilāpo duḥkhajaṃ vacaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:491: vyarthālāpaḥ pralāpaḥ syād anulāpo muhur vacaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:494: so' tideśo mad-uktāni tad-uktānīti yad vacaḥ ||SRs_1.224||
GK16simhrsku:495: nirdeśas tu bhavet so' yam aham ity ādi-bhāṣaṇam |
GK16simhrsku:500: rītiḥ syāt pada-vinyāsa-bhaṅgī sā tu tridhā matā ||SRs_1.227||
GK16simhrsku:501: komalā kaṭhinā miśrā ceti syāt tatra komalā |
GK16simhrsku:508: ete vaidarbha-mārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ||SRs_1.231||
GK16simhrsku:510: śaithilyaṃ yatra na spṛṣṭaṃ sa śleṣaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ||SRs_1.232||
GK16simhrsku:513: bandho mṛduḥ sphuṭo miśra iti tredhā sa nigadyate |
GK16simhrsku:514: tan mādhuryaṃ bhaved yatra śabde' rthe ca sphuṭo rasaḥ ||SRs_1.234||
GK16simhrsku:519: samāsa-bahulatvaṃ yat tad ojaḥ iti gīyate |
GK16simhrsku:521: kāntiḥ syād dvividhā khyātā vārtāyāṃ varṇanāsu ca |
GK16simhrsku:526: sā miśrā saiva pāñcālīty uktā tad-deśaja-priyā ||SRs_1.240||
GK16simhrsku:527: āndhrī lāṭī ca saurāṣṭrīty ādayo miśra-rītayaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:533: bhāratī sātvatī caiva kaiśiky ārabhaṭīti ca |
GK16simhrsku:534: catasro vṛttayas tāsām utpattir vakṣyate sphuṭam ||SRs_1.244||
GK16simhrsku:535: jagaty ekārṇave jāte bhagavān avyayaḥ pumān |
GK16simhrsku:543: tad imau naya durdharṣau nidhanaṃ tvarayā vibho |
GK16simhrsku:544: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā nijagāda janārdanaḥ ||SRs_1.249||
GK16simhrsku:547: adhunaiva nihanmy etāv ity ābhāṣya vaco hariḥ |
GK16simhrsku:551: bhūmes tadābhavad bhāras tad-vaśād api bhāratī |
GK16simhrsku:554: vicitrair aṅga-hāraiś ca helayā sa tadā hariḥ ||SRs_1.254||
GK16simhrsku:555: yat tau babandha keśeṣu jātā sā kaiśikī tataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:562: sa eva samayo dhātrā vṛttir ity eva saṃjñitaḥ ||SRs_1.258||
GK16simhrsku:563: hariṇā tena yad vastu valigitair yādṛśaṃ kṛtam |
GK16simhrsku:564: tadvad eva kṛtā vṛttir dhātrā tasyāṅga-sambhavā ||SRs_1.259||
GK16simhrsku:566: bhāraty-ādyā kramāj jātā ity anye tu pracakṣate ||SRs_1.260||
GK16simhrsku:571: sātvatī nāma sā vṛttiḥ proktā lakṣaṇa-kovidaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:572: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri saṃlāpottāpakāv api ||SRs_1.263||
GK16simhrsku:573: saṅghātyaḥ parivartaś cety eṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate |
GK16simhrsku:576: preraṇaṃ yat parasyādau yuddhāyotthāpakas tu saḥ ||SRs_1.265||
GK16simhrsku:578: saṅghasya bhedanaṃ yat tu saṅghātyaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ ||SRs_1.266||
GK16simhrsku:583: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri narma tat-pūrvakā ime |
GK16simhrsku:584: sphañja-sphoṭau ca garbhaś ca teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate ||SRs_1.269||
GK16simhrsku:586: agrāmyaḥ parihāsas tu narma syāt tat tridhā matam ||SRs_1.270||
GK16simhrsku:593: priyāparādha-nirbhedo' py uktas tredhā tathā budhaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:594: śuddha-hāsyajam apy uktaṃ tadvad eva tridhā budhaiḥ ||SRs_1.274||
GK16simhrsku:596: tad dvidhā mukham aṅgaṃ tu tad dvayaṃ pūrvavat tridhā ||SRs_1.275||
GK16simhrsku:600: narma-sphoṭas tu bhāvāṃśaiḥ sūcito' lpa-raso bhavet ||SRs_1.277||
GK16simhrsku:601: anyais tv akāṇḍe sambhoga-viccheda iti gīyate |
GK16simhrsku:602: netur vā nāyikāyā vā vyāpāraḥ svārtha-siddhaye ||SRs_1.278||
GK16simhrsku:603: pracchādana-paro yas tu narma-garbhaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:604: pūrva-sthito vipadyeta nāyako yatra cāparas tiṣṭhet ||SRs_1.279||
GK16simhrsku:605: tam apīha narma-garbhaṃ pravadati bharato hi nāṭya-veda-guruḥ |
GK16simhrsku:607: chedyair bhedyaiḥ plutair yuktāṃ vṛttim ārabhaṭīṃ viduḥ |
GK16simhrsku:608: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri saṅkṣiptir avapātanam ||SRs_1.281||
GK16simhrsku:611: sā saṅkṣiptir iti proktā bharatena mahātmanā |
GK16simhrsku:612: vadanty anye tu tāṃ netur avasthāntara-saṅgatim ||SRs_1.283||
GK16simhrsku:617: āsāṃ ca madhye vṛttīnāṃ śabda-vṛttis tu bhāratī |
GK16simhrsku:618: tisro' rtha-vṛttayaḥ śeṣās tac-catasro hi vṛttayaḥ ||SRs_1.286||
GK16simhrsku:619: anye tu miśraṇād āsāṃ miśrāṃ vṛttiṃ ca pañcamīm |
GK16simhrsku:621: kaiśikī syāt tu śṛṅgāre rase vīre tu sātvatī |
GK16simhrsku:624: kecit tu tam imaṃ ślokaṃ bhāratīyaṃ niyāmakam ||SRs_1.289||
GK16simhrsku:627: vicāra-sundaro naiṣa mārgaḥ syād ity udāsmahe |
GK16simhrsku:634: tatra bhāṣā dvidhā bhāṣā vibhāṣā ceti bhedataḥ ||SRs_1.294||
GK16simhrsku:635: tatra bhāṣā sapta-vidhā prācyāvantyā ca māgadhī |
GK16simhrsku:636: bāhlīkā dākṣiṇātyā ca śaurasenī ca mālavī ||SRs_1.295||
GK16simhrsku:644: sattvaṃ tad iti vijñeyaṃ prājñaiḥ sattvodbhavān imān ||SRs_1.299||
GK16simhrsku:646: sarveṣām api bhāvānāṃ yaiḥ sva-sattvaṃ hi bhāvyate ||SRs_1.300||
GK16simhrsku:654: svedaḥ sañjāyate tatra tv anubhāvā bhavanty amī ||SRs_1.304||
GK16simhrsku:666: sarve' pi sattva-mūlatvād bhāvā yadyapi sāttvikāḥ ||SRs_1.310||
GK16simhrsku:676: rakṣāyāṃ rākṣasāriṃ prabala-vimata-vidrāvaṇe vīrabhadraṃ kāruṇye rāmabhadraṃ bhuja-bala-vibhavārohaṇe rauhiṇeyam |
GK16simhrsku:681: rasārṇava-sudhākara-nāmni nāṭyālaṅkāra-śāstre rañjakollāso nāma prathamo vilāsaḥ ||SRs_2.1||
GK16simhrsku:690: taṃ cārayanti bhāvasya gatiṃ sañcāriṇo' pi ||SRs_2.4||
GK16simhrsku:692: ūrmivad vardhayanty enaṃ yānti tad-rūpatāṃ ca te ||SRs_2.5||
GK16simhrsku:693: nirvedo' tha viṣādo dainyaṃ glāni-śramau ca mada-garvau |
GK16simhrsku:695: moho mṛtir ālasyaṃ jāḍyaṃ vrīḍāvahitthā ca |
GK16simhrsku:696: smṛtir atha vitarka-cintā-mati-dhṛtayo harṣa utsukatvaṃ ca ||SRs_2.7||
GK16simhrsku:697: augryam arṣāsūyāś cāpalyaṃ caiva nidrā ca |
GK16simhrsku:698: suptir bodha itīme bhāvā vyabhicāriṇaḥ samākhyātāḥ ||SRs_2.8||
GK16simhrsku:705: anutsāhaś ca vaicittyam ity ādyā madhyame matāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:718: sa tridhā taruṇo madhyo' pakṛṣṭaś ceti bhedataḥ ||SRs_2.18||
GK16simhrsku:719: dṛṣṭiḥ smerā mukhe rāgaḥ sasmitākulitaṃ vacaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:721: madhyame tu made vāci skhalanaṃ ghūrṇanaṃ dṛśoḥ |
GK16simhrsku:723: apakṛṣṭe tu ceṣṭāḥ syur gati-bhaṅgo visaṃjñatā |
GK16simhrsku:724: niṣṭhīvanaṃ muhuḥ śvāso hikkā chardyādayo matāḥ ||SRs_2.21||
GK16simhrsku:734: anuttara-praadānaṃ ca vaimukhyaṃ bhāṣaṇe' pi ca ||SRs_2.26||
GK16simhrsku:740: śaṅkā dvidyeyam ātmotthā parotthā ceti bhedataḥ ||SRs_2.29||
GK16simhrsku:745: ākāraḥ sāttvikaś ceṣṭā tv aṅga-pratyaṅgajāḥ kriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:750: cittasya sambhramo yaḥ syād āvego' yaṃ sa cāṣṭadhā ||SRs_2.34||
GK16simhrsku:765: prīti-dānaṃ priyaṃ vākyaṃ romaharṣādayo' pi ca |
GK16simhrsku:772: viyogaje tu ceṣṭāḥ syur dhāvanaṃ paridevanam ||SRs_2.45||
GK16simhrsku:779: citta-kṣobhas tv apasmāras tatra ceṣṭāḥ prakampanam |
GK16simhrsku:782: doṣa-vaiṣamyajas tv eṣa vyādhir evety udāsmahe ||SRs_2.50||
GK16simhrsku:792: vikriyās tatra vijñeyā indriyāṇāṃ ca śūnyatā ||SRs_2.55||
GK16simhrsku:796: etac ca dvividhaṃ proktaṃ vyādhijaṃ cābhighātajam ||SRs_2.57||
GK16simhrsku:803: viṣaṃ tu vatsanābhādyam aṣṭau vegās tad-udbhavāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:804: kārṣṇyaṃ kampo dāho hikkā phenaś ca kandhara-bhaṅgaḥ ||SRs_2.61||
GK16simhrsku:805: jaḍatā mṛtir iti kathitā kramaśaḥ prathamādyā vegajāś ceṣṭāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:807: kṛcchrāt kriyonmukhatvaṃ yat tad ālasyam iha kriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:811: dṛṣṭer vā virahādeś ca kriyās tatrānimeṣatā |
GK16simhrsku:812: aśrutiḥ pāravaśyaṃ ca tūṣṇīm-bhāvādayo' pi ca ||SRs_2.65||
GK16simhrsku:821: kathā-bhaṅgādayo' py asyām anubhāvā bhavanty amī |
GK16simhrsku:826: janito nirṇayāntaḥ syād asatyaḥ satya eva vā ||SRs_2.72||
GK16simhrsku:829: cintā dhyānātmikā tasyām anubhāvā bhavanty amī |
GK16simhrsku:835: lajjādibhiś ca cittasya naispṛhyaṃ dhṛtir ucyate |
GK16simhrsku:855: guṇe' pi doṣāropaḥ syād asūyā tatra vikriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:864: śarīrasya ca saṅkoco jāḍyaṃ cety evam ādayaḥ ||SRs_2.91||
GK16simhrsku:865: udreka eva nidrāyāḥ suptiḥ syāt tatra vikriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:876: vibhāvāś cānubhāvāś ca te bhavanti parasparam ||SRs_2.97||
GK16simhrsku:878: svātantryāt pāratantryāc ca te dvidhā vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||SRs_2.98||
GK16simhrsku:880: tad-abhāve svatantrāḥ syur bhāvā iti ca te smṛtāḥ ||SRs_2.99||
GK16simhrsku:883: asatyatva-kṛtaṃ tat syād acetana-gataṃ tu yat |
GK16simhrsku:888: bhāva-dvayaṃ milati cet sa sandhir iti gīyate ||SRs_2.103||
GK16simhrsku:890: śavalatvaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ saṃmardaḥ syāt parasparam ||SRs_2.104||
GK16simhrsku:893: sajātīyair vijātīyair bhāvair ye tv atiraskṛtāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:894: kṣrābdhivan nayanty anyān svātmatvaṃ sthāyino hi te ||SRs_2.106||
GK16simhrsku:896: śoko' tha jugupsā bhayam ity aṣṭau lakṣma vakṣyate teṣām ||SRs_2.107||
GK16simhrsku:901: bhojas tu samprayogeṇa ratim anyām udāharat |
GK16simhrsku:904: premā mānaḥ praṇayaḥ sneho rāgo' nurāgaś ca ||SRs_2.111||
GK16simhrsku:905: sa premā bheda-rahitaṃ yūnor yad bhāva-bandhanaṃ |
GK16simhrsku:907: bahnāti bhāva-kauṭilyaṃ so' yaṃ māna itīryate |
GK16simhrsku:909: badhnāti bhāva-viśrambhaṃ so' yaṃ praṇaya ucyate |
GK16simhrsku:911: yatra dravaty antaraṅgaṃ sa sneha iti kathyate |
GK16simhrsku:914: itara-kleśa-kārī yaḥ sa prauḍhaḥ sneha ucyate ||SRs_2.116||
GK16simhrsku:916: dvayor ekasya mānādau tad anyasya karoti yaḥ ||SRs_2.117||
GK16simhrsku:917: naivopekṣāṃ na cāpekṣāṃ sa sneho manda ucyate |
GK16simhrsku:918: duḥkham apy adhikaṃ citte sukhatvenaiva rajyate ||SRs_2.118||
GK16simhrsku:919: yena sneha-prakarṣeṇa sa rāga iti gīyate |
GK16simhrsku:921: kusumbha-rāgaḥ sa jñeyo yaś citte rajyati kṣaṇāt |
GK16simhrsku:923: nīlī-rāgas tu yaḥ sakto nāpaiti na ca dīpyate |
GK16simhrsku:924: acireṇaiva saṃsaktaś cirād api na naśyati ||SRs_2.121||
GK16simhrsku:925: atīva śobhate yo' sau māñjiṣṭho rāga ucyate |
GK16simhrsku:928: anye prītiṃ rater bhedm āmananti na tan-matam ||SRs_2.123||
GK16simhrsku:931: laulyādeś ca parasthānām eṣām anukṛter api |
GK16simhrsku:932: vikāraś cetaso hāsas tatra ceṣṭāḥ samīritāḥ ||SRs_2.125||
GK16simhrsku:935: satvarā mānasī vṛttir utsāhas tatra vikriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:939: vistāraś cetaso yas tu vismayaḥ sa nigadyate |
GK16simhrsku:949: bhṛtya-krodhe tu ceṣṭāḥ syus tarjanaṃ mūrdha-dhananam |
GK16simhrsku:952: tūṣṇīṃ dhyānaṃ ca naiścalyaṃ śvasitāni muhur muhuḥ ||SRs_2.135||
GK16simhrsku:954: pūjya-krodhe tu ceṣṭāḥ syuḥ sva-nindā namra-vaktratā ||SRs_2.136||
GK16simhrsku:959: mithaḥ strī-puṃsayor eva roṣah strī-gocaraḥ punaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:963: sapatnī-hetur ādyaḥ syād anyaḥ syād anya-hetukaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:970: ātma-sthair atirūḍho' pi prāyaḥ śauryeṇa śāmyati ||SRs_2.144||
GK16simhrsku:972: syād eṣa mṛti-paryantaḥ sva-parasthais tu madhyame ||SRs_2.145||
GK16simhrsku:974: hetubhiḥ svagatair eva prāyaḥ strī-nīcayor ayam ||SRs_2.146||
GK16simhrsku:978: saṅkocanaṃ yan manasah sā jugupsātra vikriyāḥ ||SRs_2.148||
GK16simhrsku:986: bhaye tu ceṣṭā vaivarṇyaṃ stabdhatvaṃ gātra-kampanam ||SRs_2.152||
GK16simhrsku:994: ādyaṃ tu yukti-kākṣyāyāṃ bhaya-kakṣyāṃ na gāhate ||SRs_2.156||
GK16simhrsku:996: bhāvo vinaya eva syād atha syān nāṭake yadi ||SRs_2.157||
GK16simhrsku:998: ato hetujam evaikaṃ bhayaṃ syād iti niścayaḥ ||SRs_2.158||
GK16simhrsku:999: bhojenoktāḥ sthāyino' nye garvaḥ sneho dhṛtir matiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1001: tatra sneho rater bhedas tridhā cecchātma-tat-kṛtaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1003: tad aṣṭāv eva vijñeyāḥ sthāyino muni-saṃmatāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1004: sthāyino' ṣṭau trayastriṃśac cāriṇo' ṣṭau ca sāttvikāḥ ||SRs_2.161||
GK16simhrsku:1005: evam ekonapañcāśad bhāvāḥ syur militā ime |
GK16simhrsku:1006: evaṃ hi sthāyino bhāvān siṃha-bhūpatir abhyadhāt ||SRs_2.162||
GK16simhrsku:1009: ete ca sthāyinaḥ svaiḥ svair vibhāvair vyabhicāribhiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1020: eṣūttaras tu pūrvasmāt sambhūto viṣamāt samaḥ ||SRs_2.169||
GK16simhrsku:1022: raseṣu tatra śṛṅgāraḥ prathamaṃ lakṣyate sphuṭam ||SRs_2.170||
GK16simhrsku:1025: sa vipralambhaḥ sambhoga iti dvedhā nigadyate |
GK16simhrsku:1028: sa vipralambho vijñeyaḥ sa caturdhā nigadyate ||SRs_2.173||
GK16simhrsku:1036: tatra sañcāriṇo glāniḥ śaṅkāsūye śramo bhayam ||SRs_2.177||
GK16simhrsku:1038: viṣādo jaḍatonmādo moho maraṇam eva ca ||SRs_2.178||
GK16simhrsku:1044: savilāpā unmāda-vyādhī jaḍatā mṛtiś ca tāḥ kramaśaḥ ||SRs_2.181||
GK16simhrsku:1049: vyājoktayaś ca vijane sthitir ity evam ādayaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1051: dūtī-mukhena kiṃ vācyam ity ādy ūhas tu cintanam |
GK16simhrsku:1062: manasaḥ kampa udvegaḥ kathitas tatra vikriyāḥ ||SRs_2.190||
GK16simhrsku:1065: iha me dṛk-pathaṃ prāpad ihātiṣṭhad ihāsta ca |
GK16simhrsku:1068: tatra ceṣṭās tu kutrāpi gamanaṃ kvacid īkṣaṇam ||SRs_2.193||
GK16simhrsku:1069: kvacit kvacid avasthānaṃ kvacic ca bhramaṇādayaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1071: atasmiṃs tad iti bhrāntir unmādo virahodbhavaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1072: tatra ceṣṭās tu vijñeyā dveṣaḥ sveṣṭe' pi vastuni ||SRs_2.195||
GK16simhrsku:1073: dīrghaṃ muhuś ca niḥśvāso nirnimeṣatayā sthitiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1078: yatra kvacic ca patanaṃ srastākṣatvādayo' pi ca ||SRs_2.198||
GK16simhrsku:1079: idam iṣṭam aniṣṭaṃ tad iti vetti na kiñcana |
GK16simhrsku:1080: nottaraṃ bhāṣate praśne nekṣate na śṛṇoti ca ||SRs_2.199||
GK16simhrsku:1081: yatra dhyāyati niḥsaṃjñaṃ jaḍatā sā prakīrtitā |
GK16simhrsku:1084: tais taiḥ kṛtaiḥ pratīkārair yadi na syāt samāgamaḥ ||SRs_2.201||
GK16simhrsku:1085: tataḥ syān maraṇodyogah kāmāgnes tatra vikriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1092: īrṣyayā sambhaved īrṣyā tv anyāsaṅgini vallabhe ||SRs_2.205||
GK16simhrsku:1093: asahiṣṇutvam eva syād dṛṣṭer anumiteḥ śruteḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1101: hetujas tu śamaṃ yāti yathāyogyaṃ prakalpitaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1103: tatra priyokti-kathanaṃ yat tu tat sāma gīyate |
GK16simhrsku:1106: natiḥ pāda-praṇāmaḥ syāt tūṣṇīṃ sthitir upekṣaṇam ||SRs_2.212||
GK16simhrsku:1116: kāryataḥ sambhramāc chāpāt sa tridhā tatra kāryajaḥ ||SRs_2.217||
GK16simhrsku:1118: vṛtto vartiṣyamāṇaś ca vartamāna iti tridhā ||SRs_2.218||
GK16simhrsku:1119: āvegaḥ sambhramaḥ so' pi naiko divyādibhedataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1125: sañcāriṇo' nubhāvāś ca karuṇe' pi pravāsavat |
GK16simhrsku:1127: ghaṭate yatra yūnor yat sa sambhogaś caturvidhaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1128: saṅkṣiptaḥ saṅkīrṇaḥ sampannataraḥ samṛddhimān iti te ||SRs_2.223||
GK16simhrsku:1137: śivābhyām eva vijñeyam ity ayaṃ hi samṛddhimān |
GK16simhrsku:1142: ātmasthas tu yadā svasya vikārair hasati svayam ||SRs_2.230||
GK16simhrsku:1143: parasthas tu para-prāptair etair hasati cet param |
GK16simhrsku:1144: prakṛti-vaśāt sa ca ṣoḍhā smita-hasite vihasitāvahasite ca ||SRs_2.231||
GK16simhrsku:1167: āśvāsanoktayaḥ sthairyam ity ādyās tatra vikriyāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1191: na parīkṣākṣamam idaṃ mataṃ prekṣāvatāṃ bhavet |
GK16simhrsku:1197: [*1] Another reading in some manuscripts: anubhāvas tu naiṣphalya-matir
GK16simhrsku:1200: [*2] The following half karika is found in only one edition: (śīta-jvare
GK16simhrsku:1203: bhāvo vāpi raso vāpi pravṛttir vṛttir eva vā |
GK16simhrsku:1204: sarveṣāṃ samavetānāṃ rūpaṃ yasya bhaved bahu ||
GK16simhrsku:1205: sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇo matāḥ ||iti||
GK16simhrsku:1213: poṣaṇaṃ prakṛtasyeti ced aṅgatvaṃ na tāvatā ||SRs_2.261||
GK16simhrsku:1220: aṅgayor aṅgino vṛddhau bhaved ekatra saṅgatiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1223: hariścandro rakṣākaraṇa-ruci-satyeṣu vacasāṃ vilāse vāgīśo mahati niyame nīti-nigame |
GK16simhrsku:1232: rasārṇava-sudhākara-nāmni nāṭyālaṅkāra-śāstre rasikollāso nāma dvitīyo vilāsaḥ ||SRs_3.2||
GK16simhrsku:1233: tṛtīyo vilāsaḥ bhāvakollāsaḥ sa kṣemadāyī kamalānukūlaḥ
GK16simhrsku:1237: tad īdṛśa-rasādhāraṃ nāṭyaṃ rūpakam ity api |
GK16simhrsku:1243: nāṭakaṃ saprakaraṇam aṅko vyāyokga eva ca |
GK16simhrsku:1244: bhāṇaḥ samavakāraś ca vīthī prahasanaṃ ḍimaḥ ||
GK16simhrsku:1249: itivṛttaṃ prabandhasya śarīraṃ trividhaṃ hi tat |
GK16simhrsku:1250: khyātaṃ kalpyaṃ ca saṅkīrṇaṃ khyātaṃ rāma-kathādikam ||SRs_3.6||
GK16simhrsku:1255: bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryam ity api |
GK16simhrsku:1256: yat tu svalpam upakṣiptaṃ bahudhā vistṛtiṃ gatam ||SRs_3.9||
GK16simhrsku:1257: kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prājñais tad bījam iti kathyate |
GK16simhrsku:1260: phalāyaitad bhaved yasmād bījam ity abhidhīyate ||SRs_3.11||
GK16simhrsku:1263: jala-bindur yathā siñcaṃs taru-mūlaṃ phalāya hi |
GK16simhrsku:1267: yat kevalaṃ parārthasya sādhakaṃ ca pradeśa-bhāk |
GK16simhrsku:1272: tatrādyaṃ tri-prakāraṃ syād dvitīyaṃ tv ekam eva hi ||SRs_3.17||
GK16simhrsku:1285: upanyāsa-suyuktaś ca tac caturtham udāhṛtam ||(19.34) iti ||
GK16simhrsku:1287: phalaṃ kāryam iti śuddhaṃ miśraṃ vā kalpayet sudhīḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1288: pradhānam aṅgam iti ca tad vastu dvividhaṃ punaḥ ||SRs_3.19||
GK16simhrsku:1290: kāvye vyāpi pradhānaṃ tad yathā rāmādi-ceṣṭitam ||SRs_3.20||
GK16simhrsku:1292: nityaṃ patākā prakarī cāṅgaṃ bījādayaḥ kvacit ||SRs_3.21||
GK16simhrsku:1293: bījatvād bījam ādau syāt phalatvāt kāryam antataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1299: yatnas tu tat-phala-prāptyām autsukyena tu vartanam |
GK16simhrsku:1307: patākāyās tv avasthānaṃ kvacid asti na vā kvacit |
GK16simhrsku:1308: patākā-virahe bījaṃ binduṃ vā kalpayet sudhīḥ ||SRs_3.28||
GK16simhrsku:1318: upakṣepas tu bījasya sūcanā kathyate budhaiḥ ||SRs_3.33||
GK16simhrsku:1322: samyak prayojanānāṃ hi nirṇayo yuktir iṣyate ||SRs_3.35||
GK16simhrsku:1323: prājñaiḥ sukhasya samprāptiḥ prāptir ity abhidhīyate |
GK16simhrsku:1325: sukha-duḥkha-karaṃ yat tu tad vidhānaṃ budhā viduḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1327: udghātanaṃ yad bījasya sa udbhedaḥ prakīrtitaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1340: aratir yad bhaved tad dhi vidvadbhir vidhutaṃ matam ||SRs_3.44||
GK16simhrsku:1342: arateḥ śamanaṃ taj-jñāḥ śamam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ||SRs_3.45||
GK16simhrsku:1343: parihāsa-pradhānaṃ yad vacanaṃ narma tad viduḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1345: tat tu pragamanaṃ yat syād uttarottara-bhāṣaṇam |
GK16simhrsku:1346: yatra vyasanam āyāti nirodhaḥ sa nigadyate ||SRs_3.47||
GK16simhrsku:1348: sa-viśeṣābhidhānaṃ yat puṣpaṃ tad iti saṃjñitam ||SRs_3.48||
GK16simhrsku:1349: vajraṃ tad iti vijñeyaṃ sākṣān niṣṭhura-bhāṣaṇam |
GK16simhrsku:1350: yuktibhiḥ sahito yo' rthaḥ upanyāsaḥ sa iṣyate ||SRs_3.49||
GK16simhrsku:1352: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasya bījasya garbhas tv anveṣaṇaṃ muhuḥ ||SRs_3.50||
GK16simhrsku:1357: abhūtāharaṇam tat syād vākyaṃ yat kapaṭāśrayam |
GK16simhrsku:1359: sotkarṣa-vacanaṃ yat tu tad udāharaṇaṃ matam |
GK16simhrsku:1363: saṃrambhaṃ tu vacanaṃ saṅgirante hi toṭakam |
GK16simhrsku:1377: guru-vyatikramaṃ prāha dravaṃ tu bharato muniḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1385: siddhavad bhāvino' rthasya sūcanā syāt prarocanā |
GK16simhrsku:1389: sandhi-virodhau grathanaṃ nirṇayaḥ paribhāṣaṇe prasādaś ca |
GK16simhrsku:1392: iti nirvahaṇasyāṅgāny āhur amīṣāṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye ||SRs_3.70||
GK16simhrsku:1394: grathanaṃ tad-upekṣepaḥ syād anubhūtasya nirṇayaḥ kathanam ||SRs_3.71||
GK16simhrsku:1395: paribhāṣā tv anyonyaṃ jalpanam athavā parivādaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1402: bharataiś carācarāṇām āśīr āśaṃsanaṃ praśastiḥ syāt ||SRs_3.75||
GK16simhrsku:1404: sāphalyaṃ kāryam aṅgānām ity ācāryāḥ pracakṣate ||SRs_3.76||
GK16simhrsku:1405: keṣāṃcid eṣām aṅgānāṃ vikalpaṃ kecid ūcire |
GK16simhrsku:1406: mukhādi-sandhiṣv aṅgānāṃ kramo' yaṃ na vivakṣitaḥ ||SRs_3.77||
GK16simhrsku:1414: vakṣye lakṣaṇam eteṣām udāhṛtim api sphuṭam ||SRs_3.81||
GK16simhrsku:1416: gotra-skhalitam ojaś ca dhīḥ krodhaḥ sāhasaṃ bhayam ||SRs_3.82||
GK16simhrsku:1417: māyā ca saṃvṛtir bhrāntir dūtyaṃ hetv-avadhāraṇam |
GK16simhrsku:1418: svapna-lekhau madaś citram ity etāny ekaviṃśatiḥ ||SRs_3.83||
GK16simhrsku:1422: daṇḍas tv avinayādīnāṃ dṛṣṭyā śrutyātha tarjanam ||SRs_3.85||
GK16simhrsku:1431: saṃvṛttiḥ svayam uktasya svayam pracchādanaṃ bhavet |
GK16simhrsku:1437: madas tu madyajaḥ citraṃ cākārsya vilekhanam |
GK16simhrsku:1446: evam aṅgair upāṅgaiś ca suśliṣṭaṃ rūpaka-śriyaḥ ||SRs_3.97||
GK16simhrsku:1447: śarīraṃ vas tv alaṅkuryāt ṣaṭ-triṃśad bhūṣaṇaiḥ sphuṭam |
GK16simhrsku:1458: sa hetur iti nirdiṣṭo yat sādhyārtha-prasādhakaḥ ||SRs_3.103||
GK16simhrsku:1460: vākyaṃ yad gūḍha-tulyārthaṃ tad udāharaṇaṃ matam ||SRs_3.104||
GK16simhrsku:1462: aniścayāntaṃ yad vākyaṃ saṃśayaḥ sa nigadyate ||SRs_3.105||
GK16simhrsku:1464: abhiprāyas tv abhūtārtho hṛdyaḥ sāmyena kalpitaḥ ||SRs_3.106||
GK16simhrsku:1473: siddhān bahūn pradhānārthān uktvā yatra prayujyate |
GK16simhrsku:1475: bahūnāṃ tu prayuktānāṃ padānāṃ bahubhiḥ padaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1476: uccayaḥ sadṛśārtho yaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ padoccayaḥ ||SRs_3.112||
GK16simhrsku:1484: bahūn guṇān kīrtayitvā sāmānyena ca saṃśrayān ||SRs_3.115||
GK16simhrsku:1485: viśeṣaḥ kīrtyate yatra jñeyaḥ so' tiśayo budhaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1488: eko' pi śabdyate tat tu vijñeyaṃ guṇa-kīrtanam ||SRs_3.117||
GK16simhrsku:1489: yatra saṅkīrtayan doṣān guṇam arthena darśayet |
GK16simhrsku:1490: guṇān vā kīrtayan doṣān darśayed garhaṇaṃ tu tat ||SRs_3.118||
GK16simhrsku:1492: patanaṃ prakṛtād arthād anyasmin bhraṃśa īritaḥ ||SRs_3.119||
GK16simhrsku:1494: kṣobhas tv anya-gate hetāv anyasmin kārya-kalpanaṃ ||SRs_3.120||
GK16simhrsku:1496: prastāvanaiva śeṣo' rtho yatrānukto' pi gṛhyate ||SRs_3.121||
GK16simhrsku:1497: anukta-siddhir eṣā syād ity āha bharato muniḥ[*4] |
GK16simhrsku:1499: sādṛśyaṃ yatra saṅkṣobhāt tat sārūpyaṃ nirūpyate |
GK16simhrsku:1502: yat prasannena sārūpyaṃ yatra pūjayituṃ vacaḥ ||SRs_3.124||
GK16simhrsku:1505: pratigṛhya tu śāstrārthaṃ yad vākyam abhidhīyate |
GK16simhrsku:1508: yat pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā tad dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭavan matam ||SRs_3.127||

GK16simhrsku:1513: ṣaṭtriṃśad uktāni hi bhūṣaṇāni salakṣmalakṣyāṇi muner matena ||SRs_3.128||
GK16simhrsku:1519: anyāni rūpakāṇi syur vikārā nāṭakaṃ prati ||SRs_3.131||
GK16simhrsku:1531: prastāvanāyās tu mukhe nāndī kāryā śubhāvahā ||SRs_3.137||
GK16simhrsku:1534: aṣṭābhir daśabhiś ceṣṭā seyaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ padaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1535: samair vā viṣamair vāpi prayojyety apare jaguḥ ||SRs_3.139||
GK16simhrsku:1537: prasādhanāya raṅgasya vṛttir yojyā hi bhāratī ||SRs_3.140||
GK16simhrsku:1554: kavayas tu prabandhāras te bhaveyuś caturvidhāḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1555: udātta uddhataḥ prauḍho vinīta iti bhedataḥ ||SRs_3.149||
GK16simhrsku:1559: yuktyā nijotkarṣa-vādī prauḍha ity aparaiḥ smṛtaḥ ||SRs_3.151||
GK16simhrsku:1561: sabhyās tu vibudhair jñeyā ye didṛkṣānivtā janāḥ ||SRs_3.152||
GK16simhrsku:1562: te' pi dvidhā prārthanīyāḥ prārthak iti ca sphuṭam |

GK16simhrsku:1566: ye sūtriṇaṃ prārthayante te sabhyāḥ prārthakāḥ smṛtāh |

GK16simhrsku:1568: vādakā gāyakāś caiva nartakāś ceti kovidaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1573: evaṃ prarocayan sabhyān sūtrī kuryād athāmukham ||SRs_3.158||
GK16simhrsku:1574: sūtra-dhāro naṭīṃ brūte sva-kāryaṃ prati yuktitaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1578: sūtriṇo vākyam arthaṃ vā svetivṛtta-samaṃ yadā |
GK16simhrsku:1579: svīkṛtya praviśet pātraṃ kathodghāto dvidhā mataḥ ||SRs_3.161||
GK16simhrsku:1586: yojayed yatra nāṭya-jñair eṣā prastāvanā smṛtā |
GK16simhrsku:1589: saṃlapana prastutaṃ cārtham ākṣipet sthāpanā hi sā ||SRs_3.166||
GK16simhrsku:1597: āmukhe' pi ca vīthyāṃ ca sādhāraṇye' pi saṃmataḥ ||SRs_3.170||
GK16simhrsku:1606: prapañcas tu mithaḥ stotram asadbhūtaṃ ca hāsyakṛt |
GK16simhrsku:1617: doṣā guṇā guṇā doṣā yatra syur mṛdavaṃ hi tat ||SRs_3.180||
GK16simhrsku:1619: niṣkrānte' that tad-ākṣiptaiḥ pātrair vastu prapañcayet ||SRs_3.181||
GK16simhrsku:1620: vastu sarvaṃ dvidhā sūcyam asūcyam iti bhedataḥ |

GK16simhrsku:1622: yad vastu nīrasaṃ tat tu sūcayet sūcakās tv amī |
GK16simhrsku:1626: sa śuddho miśra ity ukto miśraḥ syān nīca-madhyamaiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1634: arthopakṣepaṇaṃ yat tu kriyate sā hi cūlikā |

GK16simhrsku:1646: sūcanaṃ tad-avicchityai yat tad aṅkāsyam īritam |
GK16simhrsku:1657: aṅkayor ubhayor madhye sa vijñeyaḥ praveśakaḥ ||SRs_3.200||

GK16simhrsku:1664: aṅkas tu pañcaṣair dvitrair aṅgino' ṅgasya vastunaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1667: asūcyaṃ tad dvidhā dṛśyaṃ śrāvyaṃ cādyaṃ tu darśayet ||SRs_3.205||
GK16simhrsku:1668: dvedhā dvitīyaṃ svagataṃ prakāśaṃ ceti bhedataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1669: svagataṃ svaika-vijñeyaṃ prakāśaṃ tad dvidhā bhavet ||SRs_3.206||
GK16simhrsku:1672: dvitīyaṃ tu sthiteṣv apy eṣv ekasya śravaṇocitam |
GK16simhrsku:1673: dvidhā vibhāvyate' nyac ca janāntam apavāritam ||SRs_3.208||
GK16simhrsku:1675: anyenāmantraṇaṃ yat syāt taj janāntikam ucyate ||SRs_3.209||
GK16simhrsku:1677: itthaṃ śrāvyaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ ca prayujya susamāhitaiḥ ||3.210||
GK16simhrsku:1678: pātrair niṣkramaṇaṃ kāryam aṅkānte samam eva hi |
GK16simhrsku:1683: aṅkasya madhye yo' ṅkaḥ syād asau garbhāṅka īritaḥ ||SRs_3.213||
GK16simhrsku:1689: prathamāṅke na kartavyaḥ so' yaṃ kāvya-viśāradaiḥ ||SRs_3.216||
GK16simhrsku:1690: so' yam uttara-rāme tu rasotkarṣāya kathyatām |
GK16simhrsku:1691: netur utkarṣako jñeyo bāla-rāmāyaṇe tv ayam ||SRs_3.217||
GK16simhrsku:1693: nāṭake' ṅkā na kartavyāḥ pañca-nyūnā daśādhikāḥ ||SRs_3.218||
GK16simhrsku:1697: āsevadhvaṃ tad ṛṣayas tasyotthānaṃ tu nāṭakam ||iti||
GK16simhrsku:1703: rasaḥ pradhānaṃ śṛṅgāraḥ śeṣaṃ nāṭakavad bhavet ||SRs_3.221||
GK16simhrsku:1704: tad dhi prakaraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ dhūrtaṃ miśraṃ ca tat tridhā |
GK16simhrsku:1708: miśraṃ tat kulajā-veśye kalpite yatra nāyike |
GK16simhrsku:1710: nāṭikā tv anayor bhedo na pṛthag rūpakaṃ bhavet |
GK16simhrsku:1711: prakhyātaṃ nṛpater vṛttaṃ nāṭakād āhṛtaṃ yataḥ ||SRs_3.225||
GK16simhrsku:1713: vimarśa-sandhi-rāhityaṃ bhedakaṃ cen na tan matam ||SRs_3.226||
GK16simhrsku:1717: devī-vaśāt saṅgamena bhedaś cet tan na yujyate |
GK16simhrsku:1720: ata eva bharata-muninā nāṭyaṃ daśadhā nirūpitaṃ pūrvam ||SRs_3.229||
GK16simhrsku:1721: khyātena vā kalpitena vastunā prākṛtair naraiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1729: ujjīvanād apy adhikaṃ manoratha-phalo' pi vā |
GK16simhrsku:1738: svasya vānyasya vā vṛttaṃ viṭena nipuṇoktinā ||SRs_3.238||
GK16simhrsku:1741: varṇyate bhāratī-vṛttyā yatra taṃ bhāṇam īrate |
GK16simhrsku:1743: anyenānuktam apy anyo vacaḥ śrutveva yad vadet |
GK16simhrsku:1744: iti kiṃ bhaṇasīty etad bhaved ākāśa-bhāṣitam ||SRs_3.241||
GK16simhrsku:1754: yojyam āsīnayā pāṭhyam āsīnaṃ tad udāhṛtam ||SRs_3.246||
GK16simhrsku:1756: lāsyaṃ prayujyate yatra sā jñeyā puṣpa-gandhikā ||SRs_3.247||
GK16simhrsku:1762: lāsyaṃ prayujyate yatra tat saindhavam iti smṛtam ||SRs_3.250||
GK16simhrsku:1776: mohātmako bhramaḥ proktaḥ kapaṭas trividhas tv ayam ||SRs_3.257||
GK16simhrsku:1781: jīva-grāho' pi moho vā kapaṭād vidravas tataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1789: ratnāvalyā samaṃ bhogo vijñeyā tad udāhṛtiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1806: asyāṃ prāyeṇa lāsyāṅga-daśakaṃ yojayen na vā ||SRs_3.272||
GK16simhrsku:1811: raso hāsyaḥ pradhānaṃ syād etat prahasanaṃ matam |
GK16simhrsku:1812: viśeṣeṇa daśāṅgāni kalpayed atra tāni tu ||SRs_3.275||
GK16simhrsku:1814: bhayam anṛtaṃ vibhrāntir gadgada-vāk ca pralāpaś ca ||SRs_3.276||
GK16simhrsku:1821: upapattis tu sā proktā yat prasiddhasya vastunaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1825: tad evānṛtam ity āhur apare sva-mata-stuteḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1829: śuddhaṃ kīrṇaṃ vaikṛtaṃ ca tac ca prahasanaṃ tridhā |
GK16simhrsku:1833: kīrṇaṃ tu sarvair vīthy-aṅgaiḥ saṅkīrṇaṃ dhūrta-saṅkulam |
GK16simhrsku:1848: catvāro' ṅkā nirvimarśa-garbhāḥ syuḥ sandhayas trayaḥ ||SRs_3.293||
GK16simhrsku:1849: dhīroddhattaś ca prakhyāto divyo martyo' pi nāyakaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1853: svalpas tasyāḥ praveśo vā so' yam īhāmṛgo mataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1861: sā hi naur atigambhīraṃ vivikṣor nāṭya-sāgaram |
GK16simhrsku:1863: tatra bhāṣā dvidhā bhāṣā vibhāṣā ceti bhedataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1867: bhāṣā dvidhā saṃskṛtā ca prākṛtī ceti bhedataḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1869: iyaṃ tu devatādīnāṃ munīnāṃ nāyakasya ca |
GK16simhrsku:1871: prakṛteḥ saṃskṛtāyās tu vikṛtiḥ prākṛtī matā ||SRs_3.305||
GK16simhrsku:1872: ṣaḍ-vidhā sā prākṛtaṃ ca śaurasenī ca māgadhī |

GK16simhrsku:1874: atra tu prākṛtaṃ strīṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ niyataṃ bhavet |
GK16simhrsku:1875: kvacic ca devī gaṇikā mantrijā ceti yoṣitām ||SRs_3.307||
GK16simhrsku:1877: ye nīcāḥ karmaṇā jātyā teṣāṃ prākṛtam ucyate ||SRs_3.308||
GK16simhrsku:1892: pūjyās tu devo munayo liṅginas tat-samāstriyaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1894: āryeti brāhmaṇo vācyo vṛddhas tāteti bhāṣyate |
GK16simhrsku:1897: chandato nāmabhir vācyā brāhmaṇais tu narādhipāḥ ||SRs_3.318||
GK16simhrsku:1898: deveti nṛpatir vācyo bhṛtyaiḥ prakṛtibhis tathā |
GK16simhrsku:1901: vidūṣakeṇa tu prāyaḥ sakhe rājan nitīcchayā ||SRs_3.320||
GK16simhrsku:1902: brāhmaṇaiḥ sacivo vācyo hy amātya saciveti ca |
GK16simhrsku:1903: śaiṣāir āryety athāyuṣman iti sārathinā rathī ||SRs_3.321||
GK16simhrsku:1907: bhaṭṭinī svāminī devī tathā bhaṭṭāriketi ca ||SRs_3.323||
GK16simhrsku:1909: rājñā tu mahiṣī vācyā devīty anyāḥ priyā iti ||SRs_3.324||
GK16simhrsku:1910: sarveṇa patnī tv āryeti pitur nāmnā sutasya vā |
GK16simhrsku:1911: tāta-pādā iti pitā mātāmbeti sutena tu ||SRs_3.325||
GK16simhrsku:1912: jyeṣṭhās tv āryā iti bhrātrā tathā syur mātulādayaḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1913: sadṛśaḥ sadṛśo vācyo vayasyety āhvayena vā ||SRs_3.326||
GK16simhrsku:1914: haleti sakhyā tu sakhī kathanīyā sakhīti vā |
GK16simhrsku:1919: vācye nīcātinīce tu haṇḍe hañje iti kramāt ||SRs_3.329||
GK16simhrsku:1920: bhartrā vācyāḥ sva-sva-nāmnā bhṛtyāḥ śilpocitena vā |
GK16simhrsku:1924: itivṛtte kalpite tu nāyakāder api sphuṭam |
GK16simhrsku:1934: śrīvatso gautamaḥ kautso gārgyo maudgalya ity api |
GK16simhrsku:1943: padmāvatīti prāyeṇa nāmnā vācyā hi nāyikā ||SRs_3.341||
GK16simhrsku:1954: ity ādi sarvam ālocya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛta-buddhinā |
GK16simhrsku:1961: niḥsāṇeṣu dhaṇaṃ dhaṇaṃ dhaṇam iti dhvānānusandhāyiṣu |
GK16simhrsku:1962: modante hi raṇaṃ raṇaṃ raṇam iti prauḍhās tadīyā bhaṭā bhrāntiṃ yānti tṛṇaṃ tṛṇaṃ tṛṇam iti
GK16simhrsku:1963: matvā dhātrā tulāyāṃ laghur iti dharaṇīṃ siṃha-bhūpāla-candre
GK16simhrsku:1965: cintāratnaugha-kalpa-druma-tati-surabhī-maṇḍalaiḥ pūritāntāpy ūrdhvaṃ nītā laghimnā tad-ari-kula-śataiḥ pūryate' dyāpi sā dyauḥ
GK16simhrsku:1968: rasārṇava-sudhākara-nāmni nāṭyālaṅkāra-śāstre bhāvakollāso nāma tṛtīyo vilāsaḥ ||3||
GK16simhrsku:1974: malaya-giri-nivāsī māruto yacchatāṅgas taruṇa-śiśira-raśmir yat suhṛt-puṇya-kīrtiḥ |
GK16simhrsku:1975: carati ciram anaṅgaḥ kvāpi kari apy adṛśyaḥ sa jayatu rasikaughair vanditaḥ pañcabāṇaḥ ||
